title: The Fifth of March: A Story of the Boston Massacre
description: “Carefully researched and lovingly written, Rinaldi’s latest presents a girl indentured to John and Abigail Adams during the tense period surrounding the 1770 Massacre. . . . Fortuitously timed, a novel that illuminates a moment from our past that has strong parallels to recent events. Bibliography.”-- Kirkus Reviews
author: Ann Rinaldi
